html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-13882018-11-08
ActFirst Nations Fiscal Management Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the First Nations Property Assessment and Taxation (Railway Rights-of-Way) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the FIRST NATIONS PROPERTY ASSESSMENT AND TAXATION (RAILWAY RIGHTS-OF-WAY) REGULATIONS in order to (1) remove Cook’s Ferry Indian Band and Little Shuswap Lake Indian Band from the Property Assessment and Taxation (Railway Right-of-Way) Regulations (made under the Indian Act); and, (2) add Cook’s Ferry and Little Shuswap Lake Indian Band to the First Nations Property Assessment and Taxation (Railway Rights-of-Way) Regulations (made under the FIRST NATIONS FISCAL MANAGEMENT ACT).
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0238 Publication Date: 2018-11-28
AttachmentsAttachment
